CustomField.description: Sets the batch size for inserting intermediate records into actual records. Adjust if hitting CPU timeout errors in your Apex Jobs. Should be greater than 0. Careful increasing over 200.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Sets the batch size for inserting intermediate records into actual records. Adjust if hitting CPU timeout errors in your Apex Jobs. Should be greater than 0. Careful increasing over 200.
CustomField.label: Insert Batch Size
